website_summaries.verdict: A two-pack of top-notch bromelain-enhanced quercetin from a giant in the health supplement industry. Reliable quality from a trustworthy brand.
pros: Contains higher-than-average concentrations of quercetin dihydrate combined with bromelain for improved absorption
Garners praise for its ability to reduce allergy-related sinus problems and combat inflammation
High manufacturing standards and rigorous testing ensure excellent quality
cons: Not suitable for those with pineapple allergies

customer_reviews.title: This product has helped reduce my food sensitivities, reducing ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped reduce my food sensitivities, reducing headaches. It also has more benefits than I will list-do your research. I will take this every day- I really feel the difference when I don't (and this fills in for my less varied fruit/vege habits).
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me the worst heartburn and didn’t seem to relieve my pain as well as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: jamiesharp

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been plagued with “hay fever” all my life in various manifestations. Taking this combination has quelled my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: secyatlaw

customer_reviews.title: But it is hard to digest. Cause gas and ...
customer_reviews.text: But it is hard to digest. Cause gas and diarrhia. I take it with food, and sometimes papaya pills or fresh to help digest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for 20 plus years. Love the NOW product.
customer_reviews.text: good bye Allergies! and inflammation. My husband and I both take 2 in am and 2 in Pm. this keeps us off of Allergy meds. Along with Hylands sis tabs for the hubby and their hayfever product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fenny

customer_reviews.title: He said it would be great for people with allergies
customer_reviews.text: I heard about quercetin with bromelain from Dr. Oz a few years ago. He said it would be great for people with allergies! Boy was he right!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynee Marie

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea if the product was damaged, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if the product was damaged, but this arrived with the box already having been ripped open and then re-taped with clear tape. Took photos.
customer_reviews.author: MNA

customer_reviews.title: If we feel like a cold is coming
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves it! My husband and I take it daily and we also give it to our kids. If we feel like a cold is coming, we bump it up a bit and it totally helps!! Cured my husband from his asthma. We absolutely recommend taking these!
customer_reviews.author: ~Cora~

customer_reviews.title: I use this to help with my allergies and love it. It helps with itchy eyes and stuffy ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help with my allergies and love it. It helps with itchy eyes and stuffy nose. I take two per day.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Marie Toimil

customer_reviews.title: Taking most supplements is a leap of faith. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Taking most supplements is a leap of faith. I use several and this is one. I can report no side effects noticed. I use Quercetin to block iron absorption.
customer_reviews.author: crystal river floirda

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergic reactions
customer_reviews.text: If you have allergies or histamine issues, itchyness, skin problems etc., you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerer, Camper, Boater, Cook

customer_reviews.title: It would be even better if it came loose in the container instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: I add it to smoothies as a way to get some extra quercetin and bromelain. It would be even better if it came loose in the container instead of being in capsules. I make smoothies in the blender and have to take extra time to twist open the capsules. Otherwise they get ground up into little hard chunks in the smoothie. Doesn't make the smoothie impossible to drink, just less fun!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Works on winter allergies just as well as hay-fever and the like. I have tried all kinds of things
customer_reviews.text: Life saver if you have chronic allergies. Works on winter allergies just as well as hay-fever and the like. I have tried all kinds of things, prescription and otherwise, nothing seems to help as much and with as little side effect as this does for me. Worth a try if you have allergies that just wont leave you be.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitivities (not allergies) to a number of foods. Wheat & dairy seem to be the worst for me. I start itching & it becomes unbearable. I was eating Benadryl like tic tacs when I discovered this. It took almost two weeks of taking it before each meal but the itching is almost a thing of the past. It has tons of other benefits but for me, itch relief is the best!
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: With allergies and fibromyalgia, quercetin with bromelain is a ...
customer_reviews.text: With allergies and fibromyalgia, quercetin with bromelain is a savior. If I go off it, I notice it immediately. When I'm using it, it makes a world of difference in my immune response and overall health. Won't be without it!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: My son's allergy inflammation levels went down on his blood ...
customer_reviews.text: My son's allergy inflammation levels went down on his blood work a tremendous amount after taking this 2 to 3 times a day for 3 months. He sneezes a lot less. If he gets lazy and doesn't take it he starts sneezing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now Foods Quercetin with Bromelain
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews about 'natural' antihistamines, I decided these suited my needs more. The ratio of quercetin to bromelain is important, apparently. These have really helped with allergies. I have been taking one with breakfast and one with dinner for three months through the winter so far. I haven't had a problem with excess mucous or watery eyes from indoor heating or outdoor allergies. These solved my problem. Now for the test with the tree pollens of Spring . . .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great size and great price. I am totally satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rcaman

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I have mild asthma along with dust ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have mild asthma along with dust and pollin allergies that make me feel sluggish all year long. Quercetin with Bromelin helps clear my head and my lungs. I sleep better when I can breath clear which helps me have a better day.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was only weast of money because of online buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Now Foods Quercetin with Bromelain, Veg-Capsules,480 (2 Pk X 240)
product_meta.description: Supports Immune Function Supports Healthy Histamine Levels Helps Manage Seasonal Discomfort* A Dietary Supplement Vegetarian Formula Quercetin is a naturally occurring bioflavonoid that supports healthy histamine levels, thereby helping to sustain a balanced immune response.Bromelain, an enzyme derived from pineapple stems, also supports healthy immune system function. The combination of Quercetin and Bromelain therefore provides powerful immunomodulating benefits important for the management of occasional seasonal discomfort.*
feature_bullets: BALANCED IMMUNE SYSTEM*: Quercetin is a naturally occurring free radical scavenger that supports healthy seasonal immune system function.* Laboratory studies have demonstrated that quercetin can also help to promote normal respiratory function.*

WITH BROMELAIN: Bromelain has a long history of use by herbalists and is known to help support a balanced immune system response to environmental challenges.* This complementary combination may thus promote year-round respiratory health and support overall seasonal comfort.* Take 2 capsules 20 minutes before meals, twice daily.
CLASSIFICATIONS/CERTIFICATIONS: Kosher, Non-GMO, Soy Free, Vegan/Vegetarian, Nut Free, Made without Gluten, Dairy Free, Egg Free

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968
